subject: Default AI Prompt colors to Custom and collapse all sections
body:
- Change AI Image Prompt Helper to default to 'Custom' colors instead of 'Use Theme'
- Collapse all CollapsibleSection components by default across all tabs:
  - MediaTab: Background Image, Image Overlay, Logo
  - ContentTab: All text groups (Title & Tagline, Body, CTA, Footnote)
  - LayoutTab: Structure, Text Alignment
  - StyleTab: Themes
  - TemplatesTab: Complete Designs
